If you have SNAP PRO - Please upload the contents of the zip file on the server and open snap-setup.php file from the browser. You will see the management panel.

Documentation is here: ​​https://www.nextscripts.com/snap-api/docs/


Some sample codes are here: https://www.nextscripts.com/snap-api/

Google+: https://www.nextscripts.com/google-plus-automated-posting/
Pinterest: https://www.nextscripts.com/pinterest-automated-posting/
Instagram: https://www.nextscripts.com/api/instagram-automated-posting/
